column6: FEAR ITSELF TIE-IN! Deadpool learned well that when the world is shaken with fear, there's only one thing to do-CASH IN BIGTIME. Frightened people will pay through the nose for some security...but why should he risk his neck fighting The Worthy when he can create his own, easily-beatable hammer-wielder? Enter: THE WALRUS! A foe Deadpool can defeat with both hands tied behind his back....or can he?
column8: | penciller:Bong Dazo | penciller:Joe Pimentel | colorist:Matt Milla | penciller (cover):Ryan Stegman | editor:Jordan White
